QuestData.Title: Elekk Training: Cruel Ogres
QuestData.Description: This beast is surely at home in Nagrand, and after the years of domestication by Draenei it will be quite easy to train.$B$BWe shall face it against the ogres of the region that you are familiar with. The Gorian Beast-Lasher, the one that smells of blood and fear, see how this elekk reacts to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Gorian Beast-Lasher while riding your Meadowstomper-In-Training.
